headline: Speakers To Tackle Agentic AI Disruption During Money20/20 Session "An AI CFO in Everyone's Pocket"
summary: Persado, a leading provider of AI-powered content performance and compliance solutions for marketing, today announced that Steve Mugford, a member of Persado's Board of Directors and former 21-year EVP and Head of Strategy for Capital One, will speak at Money20/20 USA on Monday, October 27, 2025 in Las Vegas.

headline: 2 Consumer Loan Stocks to Buy on Promising Industry Prospects
summary: While subdued asset quality remains a concern, falling rates and easier lending criteria are expected to boost the Zacks Consumer Loans industry's prospects. So, firms like Capital One and Encore Capital are poised to gain.

raw.headline: 2 Consumer Loan Stocks to Buy on Promising Industry Prospects

headline: Big banks are walking a political tightrope in Trump's Washington
summary: Banks trying to navigate the nation's capital during the Trump era are getting both political pushback and sweeping reforms that could work to their advantage.

raw.headline: Big banks are walking a political tightrope in Trump's Washington
raw.summary: Banks trying to navigate the nation's capital during the Trump era are getting both political pushback and sweeping reforms that could work to their advantage.

headline: What the Discover Acquisition Means for Capital One Shares After Strong Five Year Gains
summary: If you are staring at Capital One Financial’s ticker and wondering whether now is the moment to jump in or reconsider your position, you are far from alone. With a share price closing at $211.92 most recently, this is a stock teetering between strong long-term growth and short-term volatility. Just look at the numbers: a modest dip of -0.7% over the past week and -3.7% over the past month may seem discouraging at first glance, but zoom out and you are rewarded by powerful returns of 18.6%...
